name: ESport Manager
description: Would you like to try your hand as a manager of this e-sport? eSport Manager is a game based on the idea of e-sports competitions, especially the most popular - FPS AND MOBA.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
